Bfs< GR, TR >::SetDistMap< T > Struct Template Reference

Detailed Description

template<typename GR, typename TR>
template<class T>
struct lemon::Bfs< GR, TR >::SetDistMap< T >

Named parameter for setting DistMap type. It must conform to the WriteMap concept.

#include <lemon/bfs.h>
